item.title: Bitso API Example
item.description: Hello, in this note Iâ€™ll show how to get the Bitcoin price in the largest Mexican-Exchange which is BITSO A key concept is the Weighted Average Price (PPP - Precio Promedio Ponderado) this metric refers to the volume times price of bids and asks for a securitie, therefore if the WAP will be biased towards the price with the largest volumes of bids and asks, this will allow users to have a more realistic price of given security.
